name: Sticky Hold
short-desc: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokemon.
long-desc: This Pokemon's hold item cannot be removed by other Pokemon.  Damaging moves that would remove this Pokemon's item can still inflict damage against this Pokemon, e.g.  or .  This Pokemon can still use moves that involve the loss of its own item, e.g.  or .  Overworld: If the lead Pokemon has this ability, the encounter rate while fishing is increased.
